error TS2351: This expression is not constructable.
  Type 'Number' has no construct signatures.


!!! error TS2351: This expression is not constructable.
!!! error TS2351:   Type 'Number' has no construct signatures.
==== exponentiationOperatorWithNew.ts (0 errors) ====
    var a: any;
    var b: any;
    var c: any;
    new a ** b ** c;
    new a ** new b ** c;
    new (a ** b ** c);
